content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5) and boiler (position -24.5, -50.0) connected by pipes (positions -24.5, -51.5 and -23.5, -51.5). The steam engine is currently not generating power due to connection issues.

### Offshore pump at position(-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5) which is operational and connected to a pipe network.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Lab at position(-10.5, -10.5)
Currently, there is no lab present at the expected position. A new lab needs to be placed.

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unknown) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine (position unknown).

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) that produces copper plates.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting steam engine to boiler
- Ensure that the pipes are correctly placed and connected between the steam engine and boiler. Check the positions of pipes and ensure they are not obstructed.

### Errors when placing lab
- A lab was expected at position (-10.5, -10.5) but was not found. Ensure that the lab is placed at the correct position before attempting to access it.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
